description: gallery installation comprised of several pieces: a: large cube with flattened corners that sits in center of gallery comprised of wood panels with two different colors of stain; b: 23 pieces of tall, narrow wood panels with the surface drilled out in various patterns; c: 11 pieces of medium sized narrow wood panels with the surface drilled out in various patterns; d: 6 pieces of medium sized narrow wood pieces with surface drilled out in various patterns; e: three pieces of small sized narrow wood panels with surface drilled out in various patterns; f: Small wood cube with flattened corners comprised of various pieces of wood that fit together
dimension:
94 x 94 x 94 in. (238.76 x 238.76 x 238.76 cm) (object part, a: large cube)
96 x 249 x 1 3/4 in. (243.84 x 632.46 x 4.45 cm) (object part, b)
44 x 118 x 3/4 in. (111.76 x 299.72 x 1.91 cm) (object part, c)
20 1/4 x 61 x 1 in. (51.44 x 154.94 x 2.54 cm) (object part, d)
3 1/2 x 11 x 1/2 in. (8.89 x 27.94 x 1.27 cm) (object part, e)
2 1/2 x 2 1/2 x 2 1/2 in. (6.35 x 6.35 x 6.35 cm) (object part, f: small cube)
title: U.N.P.A.C. (Uniform Non-coding Parallax Autostereogrammic Cyclopti-cryptograms)
